param.name: Input netCDF File
param.dialogReference: Select a netCDF file from disk. The netCDF file should be a regularly spaced dataset that can be represented as a raster.

param.name: in_variable
param.dialogReference: The Variable used for each slice based on the Row Dimension. For example, Sea Surface Temp over time. Sea Surface Temp is the variable, time is the row dimension.

param.name: in_dimension
param.dialogReference: The Row Dimension. How we slice up the data. For example, Sea Surface Temp over time. Sea Surface Temp is the variable, time is the row dimension.

param.name: in_pnt
param.dialogReference: Only select one point. The point used to create the table. The point is used to query each dimension slice for the variable value. For example, if I select the point at (52,72) there would be a sea surface temp of 25 degrees on 12/1/2012.
